name: The Words of Silence
description:
A proud member of a Walking Simulator genre, The Words of Silence takes you along for an unforgettable ride through one man's trek of reflection and recollection.

Big thanks to Unity Asset Store for Free Assets checkmark, project Gutenberg for public domain poetry, rhymezone.com for rhymes, fontsquirrel.com for fonts and all the authors of public domain art used. You were the giants on who's shoulders I stood!

Special thanks to Hideo Kojima.
